Topic.Title: Does Sybil really have millions of dollars in short positions?

Message.Msg: I wouldn't be surprised if I found out that Sybil really has a big short position as she claims. She'll be wiped out with AMZN this year, though. She hasn't made a penny since November 14 last year shorting AMZN. She's been getting deeper and deeper into a trap and she doesn't know it. She's totally clueless.

Message.Title: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Hey Sybs
Message.Msg: Sybs, I think the big boys think like you do. They keep playing their option games with one eye on the bond market. The minute it starts and the music stops there will be a massive rush for chairs. It WILL be fast. Any guess at what causes the domino effects? You would think buyers would be drying up by now but they keep scooping them up.....I don't get it. - PJ p.s. SAM off the table for now. Need gun powder for NFLX and CMG, can't believe those 2 are flying north again.

Message.Title: Amazon apologizes to Netflix & others for cloud outage
Message.Msg: In L.A. times today, Business section. Amazon admits it was at fault in collapse of Netflix service Christmas, that outraged Netflix users. I'm amazed that Netflix uses Amazon, a competitor! Sounds like Netflix shoud get a refund.
